definition: uncertain because of uncontrollable circumstances, a gathering of persons representative of some larger group
details:
adjective
- uncertain because of uncontrollable circumstances
= example: uncertain because of uncontrollable circumstances
- determined by conditions or circumstances that follow
= example: determined by conditions or circumstances that follow
= synonyms: contingent on, contingent upon, dependent on, dependant on, dependent upon, dependant upon, depending on
- possible but not certain to occur
= example: possible but not certain to occur
noun
- a gathering of persons representative of some larger group
= example: a gathering of persons representative of some larger group
- a temporary military unit
= example: a temporary military unit
= synonyms: detail
